verbs.description: [ARG0: philadelphia] [V: has] [ARG1: highest rate of disability] [ARGM-LOC: among large u s cities] philadelphia residents have the highest rate of physical emotional and cognitive disabilities among large u s cities a statistic that appears to reflect the deeper degree of poverty found in the cities near the top of the list according to new research from the pew charitable trusts united states census bureau the pew charitable trusts disability twitter cornell university jim kenney philadelphia people with disabilities facebook
